item.title: MPW
item.description: score:903 Chances: Medical Properties Trust’s Q2 earnings may benefit from favorable healthcare industry trends and capital recycling efforts. Investors looking for super-high-yield dividend stocks may consider Medical Properties Trust with its dividend yield of about 11.6%. Medical Properties Trust will host a conference call to discuss its Q2 2023 financial results.
